div.p: The shared technologies group for Final Cut Pro and iMovie is looking for an experienced software engineer to help in the design and implementation of new services that offer a best-in-class experience for video consumers, hobbyists, and professionals. The ideal candidate will have familiarity with application architecture, API design, and concurrent programming.

ul.li: Strong objective-C and macOS programming skills
Experience with file system APIs and concurrent programming
Experience with databases and networking is a plus.
Familiarity with video editing is useful but not a requirement.
